snippet: KREMEN--Andrea, died on January 7, 2016 at the age of 68. Beloved wife of Arnold Kotlen. Loving mother of Jessica (Bill) and Gillian. Adoring grandmother of Alek and Jake. Dear daughter of Ruth Kremen. She had a life filled with a distinguished career in the legal field, countless trips all over the world, hours spent reading novel after novel, and an endless love of the arts. However, the true light of her life was the time spent with her two grandchildren. Services Monday, 12 noon at "The Riverside" 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
